segments.text: I see two children involved in a secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is climbing on a two-step stool near some open cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm worried it's going to tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into a "COOKIE JAR" that's high up in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is in the jar, the other holds a plate, perhaps to catch the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched so precariously, it makes me hold my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing below him, looking up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand raised, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their cookie mission, ignoring all else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt or break anything.
segments.speaker: PAR
